column4: hello i need some help on my wifi card VT6655 any one care to help?
ic ant put it to work discord
does your system detect it?
no
i have the driver but it is a the source :( and i cant compile it
how do you know? what commands did you try?
http://www.logicsupply.com/blog/2008/03/07/patching-and-building-the-vt6655-driver-on-ubuntu-710/
i have the latest driver and that is not the latest
its a guide on how to compile it
if i type make i get this http://paste.ubuntu.com/717697/
install wicd. it should detect your wireless network
lspci,lsusb may list your card somewhere i guess
yes as via vt6655
it means the system is detecting the card >.> just install wicd and search for an existing wifi network
open the program and scan
:p my network is hidden ssid :p so not in the list
it searches though? scans?
:D
good. try connecting to your hidden network now :P
done it :) i just need to know if i need the gtk interface or is i can just use the console
do an "apt-cache search wicd". install everything that starts with wicd :P
still the same problem i rebooted and no driver :(
